scenario.name: Group Call Client 2
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:mcptt_c2@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: MCPTT-Server <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> From: mcptt_c2 <sip:mcptt_c2@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:mcptt_c2@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: MCPTT-Server <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> From: mcptt_c2 <sip:mcptt_c2@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [$1] User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0
